sentences.en: At best, it is self - explanatory and saves you the long , tedious perusal of the operating manual.
sentences.cn: 最好的则是不言自明, 你用不着看枯燥的使用说明就能使用产品.

sentences.en: I also attached our family pictures just for your perusal.

sentences.en: It also boasts an intelligent set of travel links and lists for your perusal.

sentences.en: The JDBC documentation shows a plethora of parameters for your perusal.

sentences.en: When he had ended the perusal, he folded the letter and resumed his pensive attitude.
sentences.cn: 读完信以后, 他把信叠好,恢复了他那若有所思的神情.
